title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to chat with Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, managing models, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial rich CLI wrapper with interactive chat, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style code-completion plugin powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing fluent APIs and reactive wrappers for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation combining Ollama local models and Hugging Face embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and module for declarative installation on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that pipelines container builds with Ollama for on-device testing of AI features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration providing private and channel-based chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot plugin embedding Ollama NPCs inside Minecraft for in-game conversational agents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering Ollama generators and chatters for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK with .NET 8 support for chatting, embedding, and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for embedding Ollama inference into Go services and CLIs.
